Read [the tidyverse style guide](https://style.tidyverse.org/). CodeClan's preference is snake_case. My personal preference is camelCase, or skewer-case for file names and URLs (search engine optimisation reasons).

```{r codeClanPreference}
my_variable<-0 # Use snake case for variable names
my_data<-read.csv("file")
```

```{r libraries}
# Call libraries first
# install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r example}
big_function(
  something = "that",
  requires = "many",
  arguments = "yo"
)
```

```{r styler}
# install.packages("styler")
library(styler)
```

Styler can be accessed through the Addins menu.
